recipes.title: แมวเปอร์เซีย (Persian)
recipes.description: Regarded as a very beautiful cat in the Middle East Certainly that is native to the Persian region. Or Turkey and Iran today Persians were considered the first breed of foreign cats. That has been imported into Thailand Therefore, this cat breed is still popular among cat lovers. Because aside from having a charming appearance The fur of the Persian cat is also colorful. And personal habits are very cute too Oh ... This kind of person who doesn't fall in love is crazy.
ingredientLines: 4 baby chickens (poussins) or cornish hens (about 1 1/4 pounds each), or 4 chicken breast halves
1 tablespoon crushed red-pepper flakes, or to taste

recipes.title: อเมริกันช็อตแฮร์ (American Short Hair)
recipes.description: American cat breed that is descended from European countries. And spread to America When the Europeans went to search for a new place of residence In which they brought an American cat-hair cat on the boat too To prevent rats from destroying things And the breed was developed later Until it became America's short haired native cat
ingredientLines: 2 or 3 links of chineses sausage, cut into 1/4 inch slices
Finely chopped green onion or cilantro

recipes.title: สก็อตติช โฟลด์ (Scottish Fold)
recipes.description: Is a cat native to Scotland. The Scottish Fold cat breed was first discovered in 1961 in Scotland named Susie. It is a white cat with folded ears around the front. And back The face resembles an owl. Or the face of the otter The first person I noticed was William Ross, who was a shepherd. William and Marry, his wife, were cats. Both are very interested in Susie's character.
ingredientLines: 40 chicken wing pieces, or 20 whole chicken wings
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
1/3 to 1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro leaves
1/4 cup light or regular sour cream
Juice 1/2 lemon (or why not try lime?)

recipes.title: แมวโคราช (Korat)
recipes.description: This cat breed has many names, whether it is a Malay cat, a Lao cat or a roan cat. Which is one of the 17 sacred cats of Thailand That has been bestowed the name of King Rama 5, according to the origin of this breed, found in Phimai District, Nakhon Ratchasima Province. The reputation of Korat cats is famous throughout the world.
ingredientLines: 1.0 tbsp vinegar (you can use cider, malt or wine)

recipes.title: แมววิเชียรมาศ
recipes.description: Thai cats, known by foreigners as Siamese Cat, or Siamese cats, one of the ancestors of Thai cats that have been improved to create a variety of Thai cats. Which according to legend, the book of Khoi If anyone has raised a cat, Wichianmat will become a nobleman. Because Wichianmat is considered a cat of fortune
ingredientLines: 6 to 8 fresh long rice cake sticks, or 20 smaller rice cake sticks
3 to 4 tablespoons light soy sauce, depending on saltiness

recipes.title: แมวขาวมณี
recipes.description: This matter of Khao Mani has no clear evidence of its history. Because of the history that Khao Mani will start to be seen during the early Rattanakosin period. With the assumption that Khao Mani is probably the cat that came with the junk of a Chinese merchant. Raised to catch rats aboard But because white is a clean color And is a sacred color for Thai people
ingredientLines: 1 box (about 18 oz.) yellow or white cake mix

recipes.title: บริติช ช็อตแฮร์ (British Shorthair)
recipes.description: The oldest local cat breed on the British Isles It is said that their ancestors came from cats that were adopted by Romans 2,000 years ago and are very popular cats in the country of origin. And other European countries until the present day
ingredientLines: 1 box (about 18 oz.) yellow or white cake mix

recipes.title: แมวเอ็กโซติก (Exotic)
recipes.description: Sassy cat Philanthropy With a broken bridge Descended from 2 breeds of cats between the Persian and the American cat, the hair became an Exotic cat. The cat breeds will come in a variety of colors, such as Exotic Cream Tabby, Exotic Blue Tabby, Exotic Red Tabby.
ingredientLines: 1 box (about 18 oz.) yellow or white cake mix

recipes.title: แมวเมนคูน (Main Coon)
recipes.description: Big brother, kind, Maine coon cat Although it has a body that is larger than normal cats, it has been given the nickname Gentel Giant by the name of this cat breed. Originated in Maine in the United States of America Which is their origin. The word Coon comes from the narratives of the native people who say The domestic cat accidentally went to dangle with the raccoon until these 2 words were combined. Became a name commonly known as Maine Coon
ingredientLines: 1 box (about 18 oz.) yellow or white cake mix

recipes.title: แมวเบงกอล (Bengal)
recipes.description: The Bengal cat is a beautiful patterned cat. Similar to a little star boy scout By assuming that the Bengal cat was born from breeding between Meow cat and house cat, Egyptian Chien Moore Which was an ancient Egyptian cat That resembles a wild cat The breed was developed by Jean Mills, an American woman who was crazy about the stripes of wild cats.
ingredientLines: 1 box (about 18 oz.) yellow or white cake mix
